titles.title: Stop the Shutdowns Transferring Unnecessary Pain and Inflicting Damage In The coming Years Act
Stop the Shutdowns Transferring Unnecessary Pain and Inflicting Damage In The coming Years Act

To provide for continuing appropriations in the event of a lapse in appropriations under the normal appropriations process, other than for the legislative branch and the Executive Office of the President.
Stop the Shutdowns Transferring Unnecessary Pain and Inflicting Damage In The coming Years Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.
